证据片段: Zirconium's corrosion resistance is exceptional in a broad range of aggressively corrosive environments.

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk1
证据片段: Zirconium clad has become a broadly accepted material of construction for a significant range of chemical process equipment.

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk1
证据片段: It exhibits excellent resistance to corrosive attack in most organic and inorganic acids, salt solutions, and strong alkalis.
介质: most organic and inorganic acids, salt solutions, and strong alkalis

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk1
证据片段: Zirconium's ability to withstand alternating acidic and basic environments is unusual.

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk1
证据片段: Zirconium alloy R60702 (ASTM B551 Alloy 702) [4], which is essentially chemically pure zirconium, is the most commonly used grade (Table 1).

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk1
证据片段: allowable design strength for R60702 drops off more quickly with increasing temperature than that of stainless steels and nickel alloys (Fig. 1).

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk1
证据片段: clad typically offers cost benefits over solid R60702 construction when the required wall thickness of R60702 exceeds $1 5 ~ \mathrm { m m }$ .

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk2
证据片段: Typical bond shear strength of zirconium clad manufactured Dynamic Materials Corporation (DMC) is around $2 0 0 \ \mathrm { M P a }$

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk2
证据片段: Optical microscopy shows no evidence of heating. No significant melt layers can be observed.

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk3
证据片段: A review of manufacturing records indicates that three zirconium clad pressure vessels were put into service in the 1980s, 12 in the 1990s, and over 30 in the 20002009 time period.

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk3
证据片段: A review of manufacturing records indicates that three zirconium clad pressure vessels were put into service in the 1980s, 12 in the 1990s, and over 30 in the 20002009 time period.

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk3
证据片段: Over this period, hundreds of zirconium heat exchangers with clad tubesheets were put into service.

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk3
证据片段: Zirconium is an exceptional material for containment of corrosive media in CPI processes. The corrosion resistance of zirconium is exceptional in a broad range of aggressively corrosive environments.

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk7
证据片段: Hydrogen pickup increased with increasing solute concentration and with decreasing initial SPP sizes

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk7
证据片段: increase in the coolant dissolved H₂ content decreases the oxide potential drop

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk7
证据片段: increased water H₂ content decreases the driving force of the potential gradient on H⁺ diffusion through the oxide

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk7
证据片段: PWR temperatures are high enough for hydrogen to diffuse from the base of an SPP before forming a hydride

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk7
证据片段: diffusion is slower in BWRs due to the lower BWR temperatures

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk7
证据片段: when a PWR operates with low dissolved H₂ in the coolant, nodules do form

证据片段: nodule formation is associated with corrosion potentials of no more than 600 mV

证据片段: H2 additions reduce the ECP by 450-600 mV

证据片段: In the moderate-flux region above the booster rods, the similar potential difference is 100-200 mV

证据片段: Ruiz et al. [64] measured the effect of hydrogen concentration in the plenum of a BWR and found that the potential decreased by about $5 5 0 \mathrm { m V }$ as hydrogen concentration increased to about 2.5 parts per million

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk9
证据片段: the potential difference between hydrogenated and oxygenated conditions in the core coolant environment is at least $6 0 0 \mathrm { m V }$

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk9
证据片段: Urquhart et al. demonstrated that $6 0 0 ~ \mathrm { m V }$ more potential drop develops across the oxide of nodule-susceptible alpha-annealed Zircaloy-4 than for nonsusceptible beta-heat-treated Zircaloy-4 in $5 0 0 ^ { \circ } \mathrm { C }$ 1500-psi steam

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk9

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk9
证据片段: The Zircaloy alloying elements $\mathrm { C r }$ , Fe, and Ni have negative ECPs at standard states, that is, $E ^ { o }$ values, in the range of $- 7 4 0 ~ \mathrm { m V }$ to $- 2 5 0 ~ \mathrm { m V }$ SHE

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk9
证据片段: Andresen [70] estimates can occur for the maximum impact of $\mathrm { H } _ { 2 }$ injection, which is known to suppress nodule formation

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk9
证据片段: Etoh et al. [35] conducted postirradiation corrosion tests on as-irradiated and on irradiated and annealed nodule-susceptible Zircaloy-2. They found that nodular-susceptible Zircaloy did not form nodules when corrosion tested after irradiation. However, when postirradiation annealing was performed to precipitate the solutes into SPPs prior to corrosion testing, nodules formed in subsequent corrosion testing

证据片段: Fe and Ni in the oxide could shift the surface potential, thereby reducing nodule susceptibility.
